item.title: Startup backed by Altman, JPMorgan announces capital lending partnership with Amazon
item.description: Slope, an AI lending platform backed by JPMorgan Chase, told CNBC exclusively that it is launching a partnership with Amazon's independent sellers.

item.title: Nasdaq moves to make trading nearly 24 hours. Why some on Wall Street say that's a bad idea
item.description: Critics argue that formalizing nearly nonstop trading could worsen some of the very problems that plague the structure of equity markets today.

item.title: Kevin Hassett retakes lead in Fed chief race on Kalshi after being briefly overtaken by Warsh
item.description: Traders marked Warsh as the narrow favorite to replace Jerome Powell, assigning him roughly a 46% chance of nomination, compared with about 39% for Ha...

item.title: Investors are all in on stocks: Bank of America survey shows record low cash level
item.description: The share of portfolios in cash fell to a record low 3.3% in December, according to the bank's Global Fund Manager survey.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Pfizer, Roku, Kraft Heinz & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.
